content.raw: @carromj while testing pull request #3103, I'm seeing some backtraces implicating `Publisher::OnPublishComplete`, and it looks to me like `this->mutex` will be locked inside the `try` block and then immediately released, so the later operations on `this->pubIds` won't be protected by the mutex. Were those operations intentionally excluded from the try-catch, or should I experiment with putting them inside so they will have mutex protection? Hopefully that change doesn't mess up the shutdown
